alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued December 17 at 6:17AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A FLOOD ADVISORY is IN EFFECT THROUGH 9 AM... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from recent rainfall WHERE...all islands WHEN...Through 9 AM SST this morning IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 617 TAEAO ASO SA TESEMA 17 2023 ...UA IAI nei LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 9 i le taeao nei... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga ua mavae atu NOFOAGA...motu uma TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 9 i le taeao nei AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
